org.apache.storm.grouping

インタフェース CustomStreamGrouping

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    Serializable
    既知のサブインタフェースのリスト:
    LoadAwareCustomStreamGrouping
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    GlobalGrouping, IdentityGrouping, IndexHashGrouping, LoadAwareShuffleGrouping, Murmur3StreamGrouping, NGrouping, PartialKeyGrouping, ShuffleGrouping

    public interface CustomStreamGrouping
extends Serializable

    • メソッドのサマリー

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      List<Integer> chooseTasks(int taskId, List<Object> values)
      This function implements a custom stream grouping.
      void prepare(WorkerTopologyContext context, GlobalStreamId stream, List<Integer> targetTasks)
      Tells the stream grouping at runtime the tasks in the target bolt.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • prepare

        void prepare(WorkerTopologyContext context,
             GlobalStreamId stream,
             List<Integer> targetTasks)

        Tells the stream grouping at runtime the tasks in the target bolt. This information should be used in chooseTasks to determine the target tasks.

        It also tells the grouping the metadata on the stream this grouping will be used on.

      • chooseTasks

        List<Integer> chooseTasks(int taskId,
                          List<Object> values)

        This function implements a custom stream grouping. It takes in as input the number of tasks in the target bolt in prepare and returns the tasks to send the tuples to.

        パラメータ:
        values - the values to group on
